name: Pen Island VR
description: Pen Island is a fast-paced survival game for HTC Vive. You've washed up on a very strange island. The hunters, however, want you off. Defend yourself with whatever made it to shore. Can you survive longer than the poor souls who came before you? Wait - is that a ...?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 or newer. Processor: Intel Core i5 4590 or AMD FX 8350 or greater. Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GeForce GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 or better. Storage: 500 MB available space
